article: the afghan government has strongly condemned the `` terrorist attacks '' in casablanca , sending condolences to those closest to the victims and the moroccan government , foreign affairs minister abdullah abdullah said saturday in a statement .
abstract: afghanistan condemns terrorist attacks in casablanca
